name: Leaderboard
backend_requirements: Access control: allow public read-only leaderboard; require auth for score submissions
1. Score model: id, player_name (required), score (integer, required), achieved_at
3. GET /api/leaderboard - return top 10 scores sorted descending
4. GET /api/leaderboard?player=name - get player's rank and best score
5. Input validation: player_name required (max 50 chars), score must be non-negative
frontend_requirements: Public guest view of leaderboard with CTA to sign in for submitting scores
1. Leaderboard table: rank, player name, score, date
3. Submit score form with player name and score
4. Filter to show all-time or today's scores

api_endpoints.description: Get top players sorted by score

admin_requirements: 1. Admin overview list with total/active/inactive counts
2. Toggle active status for any score

admin_api_endpoints.description: Admin overview: list all scores and counts
